author: Corey Knapp
title: April 20: The NFL Draft and More to Watch This Week
description: The 2020 NFL Draft arrives this week and will help to bring a bit of the live event feel back to the sports world. The draft and the next episodes of The Last Dance give sports fans plenty to look forward to this week beginning on Thursday...
content:
The NFL draft will be completely remote this year, but there should still be plenty of drama.Steve Helber/Associated Press
